meanings.definition: In a diligent or thorough manner
meanings.sent1: She worked sedulously on her homework, making sure every detail was perfect.
meanings.sent2: He studied sedulously for the exam, reviewing his notes multiple times.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel searched sedulously for its hidden acorn stash, determined not to forget where it buried them.
meanings.sent4: The detective examined the crime scene sedulously, looking for any clues that might have been missed.
meanings.sent5: The gardener tended to the flowers sedulously, ensuring they received just the right amount of water and sunlight.

meanings.sent1: Her sedulously crafted artwork impressed everyone with its attention to detail.

meanings.sent3: The sedulously organized event planner ensured every aspect of the party was perfect.
meanings.sent4: The sedulously focused student never gave up, even when faced with difficult challenges.
meanings.sent5: The sedulously dedicated nurse cared for her patients with unwavering commitment and compassion.

meanings.sent1: The teacher watched sedulously as the students took their exams, making sure there was no cheating.
meanings.sent2: She listened sedulously to the instructions, determined not to miss any important details.
meanings.sent3: The cat observed sedulously as the mouse moved around the room, waiting for the perfect moment to pounce.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted sedulously, focusing on each brushstroke to create a masterpiece.
